item_title: Campagnolo Bora Ultra WTO 60 Disc Brake Wheelset
item_description:
We are proud to announce the ultimate evolution of the recent Bora WTO range: Bora ULTRA WTO. The Ultra upgrade is disc brake and 2 way fit only and incorporates 360° improvements delivering reduced weight, faster rolling, higher reactivity, better handling alongside a new finish with new graphics that really makes Ultra stand out from the crowd. Our extraordinary new premium wheel series, the result of years of significant development and improvements; taken to a new level maximising their performance.

BORA ULTRA WTO 60 disc brake: born to offer that extra boost needed to dominate the finish line, no matter the type of race. A wheel that can transform the output of the most powerful rider into victories.
Wheel Developed in the Wind Tunnel: every wheel component, from the rim to the hub and the spokes, is designed to guarantee maximum aerodynamic penetration.
Rim Made Entirely of High Modulus Carbon: the unidirectional carbon rim delivers the readability and rigidity that Campagnolo is known for.
Cup-and-Cone Bearing System: easy to register balls/bearings - reduced possibility of ball/bearing play - precise cycling operations - steady performance levels.

ULTRA NIPPLES AERO MO-Mag™
Internal aero nipples with external tension adjustability.
Extremely clean look.
Quick and easy spoke maintenance, even with the the tyre fitted.
Keys included in the accessory bag

WEIGHT: 1515 g
DISCIPLINE: Road aero/performance
RIM DIAMETER: 700 c
BRAKING SYSTEM: Disc AFS
GRAPHICS: Water Transfer DCS (Dark, copper shaded)
FREEHUB COMPATIBILITY:N3W, XDR, HG, MicroSpline
RIM MATERIAL: UD high strength carbon fiber
PROFILE DEPTH: 60 mm
INNER WIDTH: 19 mm
EXTERNAL WIDTH: 26,1 mm
CAMPY PROFILE: 2 way fit (tubeless with no tape)
TYRE COMPATIBILITY: Tubeless, tubeless ready, clincher
TYRE DIMENSIONS: From 23mm up to 33 mm Aerodinamically optimized for 25mm
HUBS: F carbon, R aluminium alloy 36t oversized ractchet ring
BEARINGS: CULT ceramic
FRONT AXLE: 12 x 100 mm
REAR AXLE: 12 x 142 mm
SPOKES: 24, G3 pattern 1.5 double butted Aero elliptical section , straight pul
NIPPLES: Aluminium alloy , self lock , internal Aero Mo Mag system ™
WEIGHT LIMIT: 120 kg (rider + bike)

item_title: Easton EC90 AX 700c Clincher Disc Wheel - Front 700c 12 x 100mm/15 x 100mm
item_description:
The EC90 AX disc wheelset joins our unbeatable line of AX components to expand your horizons. Utilizing our EC90 carbon, this rim's wider stance and light weight give you control on the ground during gravel descents, bikepacking adventures or cyclocross events. Optimized for 35c tires and larger, this tubeless ready wheelset has an impressive 24mm interior width for maximum coverage. Pair them with your upcoming adventure bike build and you can have the ultimate carbon setup for all the abuse you can dish.
For supreme durability, we laced our EC90 AX rims to our new Vault hub - designed to exceed your needs from tarmac to single track. Larger bearings on a wider bearing stance and improved seals help to push reliability to a new level. A reversed drive ring configuration gives 60 points of engagement at just 6-degrees for instant acceleration. Included in the box are tool-free swappable end-caps for all major axle standards and 5 extra straight-pull Sapim spokes (shipped with rear wheels) that match the uniform spoke length throughout both wheels. With center lock discs and easy tubeless ready setup, the EC90 AX wheelset is the perfect partner for your journey.

WHEEL WEIGHT 1470g
FINISH GLOSS CARBON / VINYL DECALS
TYPE TUBELESS READY CARBON CLINCHER
RIM MATERIAL EC90 CARBON
RIM DEPTH 21MM
INTERNAL RIM WIDTH 24MM
EXTERNAL RIM WIDTH 31MM
SPOKES SAPIM STRAIGHT-PULL DOUBLE BUTTED
SPOKE PATTERN 24 / 3X
BRAKING SURFACE DISC - CENTER LOCK ROTOR MOUNT
NIPPLE TYPE DT EXTERNAL ALLOY
FRONT HUB EASTON VAULT CENTER-LOCK 12X100 
ENGAGEMENT 60 POINT, 6°
BEARING TYPE SEALED CARTRIDGE BEARINGS

item_title: Reynolds ARX 29x Carbon Clincher Disc Wheelset
item_description:
The Reynolds AR29 X DB is a carbon road bike wheelset that proves that light weight and disc brakes can go hand in hand.
The ride quality is snappy due to its minimal 1455 grams, yet they feel solid through turns and during out of the saddle efforts because of the lateral strength of the 29.5 mm wide rim.
The generous 21mm tubeless ready rim channel mates nicely with a range of tire widths providing extra versatility.
Features:

Wide, Tubeless Ready rim provides better fit for higher volume tyres that increase grip, lower rolling resistance and provide greater comfort
Refined, wider rim shapes have been optimized for crosswind stability at a variety of yaw angles
Features Sapim CX-Sprint spokes with alloy nipples
Premium graphics offer ultra clean and subtle appearance
Equipped with fast rolling and smooth Reynolds Allroad hubs which offer 10° of hub engagement
Disc and rim brake specific models available
Fitted with tubeless tape, and supplied with tubeless valves.
Lifetime warranty

Specification:

Rim Material: Carbon Fibre.
Rim Size: 700c.
Rim Width: Internal 21mm, External 29.5mm.
Rim Depth: 30mm.
Hub: Reynolds TR6 - 10 degree engagement.
Spoke Count: 24 Front, 24 Rear.
Spokes: Sapim CX-Sprint bladed spokes.
Nipples: Alloy nipples.
Brake Interface: Disc Only, Centre Lock.
Front Axle Spacing: 12x100 & 15x100 (Included), QR 100 (Available Separately).
Rear Axle Spacing: 12x142 (Included), QR 135 & 12x135 (Available Separately).
Freehub: Shimano/SRAM 9-11spd, Campy or SRAM XD-R.
Weight: 1455g.

item_title: Zipp 404 Firecrest Carbon Tubeless Disc Brake Front Wheel
item_description:
Zipp’s 404 Firecrest Tubeless Disc-brake is the icon of speed with three decades of use.
The 404’s heritage as Zipp’s icon of speed extends back decades, and its future is even brighter. At 58mm deep, the 404 Firecrest Tubeless is ideal for road races, time trial and triathlon, and gran fondos. The wheelset’s 23mm internal width is perfect for running wider tubeless tires at reduced air pressure.
That is a vital component of Total System Efficiency, or TSE, an approach to speed on ever-changing roads and riding conditions. Specifically, TSE focuses on overcoming specific barriers to speed: wind resistance, gravity, rolling resistance, and vibration losses.
Zipp’s ABLC Sawtooth Technology uses an intricate dimpling pattern to improve aero efficiency. Zipp’s use of hookless (straight side) rims in the 404 Firecrest is integral to Making You Faster. With hookless, the transition between the tire and the rim is more seamless and aero. Zipp’s hookless rims have more efficient resin distribution, which means lighter, stronger wheels.
Outdoor testing commissioned by Zipp revealed the real-world gains of Zipp TSE. A bike- and-rider system weighing 85kg (187lbs) on the new 404 Firecrest with 25mm tires required 286 watts to maintain a speed of 40kph. That’s a 4-watt savings compared with the previous model 404 Firecrest.
At the center of the 404 Firecrest Tubeless Disc-brake is a versatile and durable hubset, the German-engineered ZR1 DB. If you had to choose just one wheel for road riding and racing, the 404 Firecrest Tubeless Disc brake is a savvy and speedy choice.
Technology:

Total System Efficiency
ABLC Dimples

Features:

Versatile race wheelset for the modern road race bike with tubeless and hookless rim profile
Optimized tire bed for easy tire installation
Wide 23mm rim profile creates a better tire interface to be fast on or off the road
New ZR1 DB hub is engineered in Germany with better seal design for improved durability and quicker response with 66 points of engagement
Ships with 12mm front and rear end caps
Center locking rotor interface. Lockring is included with the wheels
XDR or SRAM/Shimano driver bodies
Campagnolo driver body sold separately
The 404 Firecrest Tubeless Disc-brake is about 370 grams lighter than its predecessor
1450g wheelset*
Front 660g Rear 790g
Lifetime Warranty

*Lightest configuration: 12mm through axles and XDR body. No tape or valve included in weight

Centrelock adaptors allow you to run a 6 bolt rotor on a centrelock hub. This version is suited best for hubs with 15mm or 20mm Thru Axles, though you may need this version for hubs with QR or 12mm Thru Axles if they use larger end caps (newer Kinesis Crosslight wheels). It is tightened using an external BB cup tool.

item_title: Zipp 303 Firecrest Carbon Tubular Front Wheel
item_description:
Zipp’s 303 Firecrest Carbon Clincher is an all-around wheelset in every way. It’s rich in heritage yet loaded with innovations. It’s as adept in the mountains as it is on rolling hills, windswept farm lanes, or ferocious field sprints.
At Zipp, we never rest on laurels. Our engineers can’t sit still long enough to – they’re too busy innovating. Think lighter weight. Think greater speed and control. Think increased stopping power. One of our all-time best-selling wheelsets, the 303 Firecrest Carbon Clincher offers dramatic improvements over its predecessors:
More Speed: Revised rim profile for reduced aerodynamic drag developed by our advanced development team in Indianapolis, Indiana, USA.
Greater AeroBalance™: ABLC™ Sawtooth™ Technology, a complex dimpling pattern first developed for our top-level NSW wheel lineup. This technology helps to achieve the optimization of low aerodynamic drag and crosswind stability, which we call AeroBalance.
Better braking: Zipp’s ShowStopper™ textured braking surface delivers unrivalled rim braking performance in wet or dry conditions.
Lighter Weight: The 303 Firecrest Carbon Clincher is 145 grams lighter than its previous iteration.

The original full-performance version. CushCore allows you to push the limits of your tyres and suspension to new levels. The best choice for the majority of wheels, terrain, and riders.
How it works:
Not all tyre inserts are created the same.
CushCore is no ordinary tyre insert and is based on a new concept, tyre suspension. Any suspension system has a spring and a damper, and with CushCore, pressurised air in the tyre is the spring and the CushCore tyre insert is the damper.
Like traditional suspension, a constant damping force wouldn't work. It has to be dynamic. Suspension should be supple on small bumps but firm on the big hits.
CushCore responds differently depending on the tyre load and scenario. The more the tyre flexes, the more damping it provides.

Go Bigger - CushCore improves suspension performance by 16% and reduces impact force from big hits by 50%. Send it with total confidence.
Corner Harder - 35% more sidewall stability eliminates tyre squirm and burping, even at low tyre pressure. Rail corners with total confidence.
Ride Faster - CushCore provides a 12% smoother ride and 3% reduced rolling resistance. Ride with more control, more momentum, and less fatigue. It's like taking fewer punches in a fight.

Includes:

(1) CushCore tyre insert,
(1) 44mm CushCore green presta air valve,
Rim stickers.

item_title: Prime Doyenne 50 Carbon Rim Brake Wheelset
item_description:
Whether you’re road racing on the flat or competing in a time trial (TT) or triathlon (Tri) event, the Prime Doyenne 50 Carbon Rim Brake Wheelset comes equipped with a carbon fibre build and a range of performance-enhancing technologies.
This wheelset features an ultra-stiff carbon fibre construction, which makes it strong enough for road racing as well as training. Coming equipped with a revised wider rim profile, this race-ready wheelset delivers increased aerodynamics, comfort, speed and traction when you need it most. Prime has also ensured that its rim profile is deep enough for time trails and crits, so you can enjoy its versatile performance whatever your discipline.
Developed with Team Spectra
Developed with Team Spectra, the Prime Doyenne 50 Carbon Rim Brake Wheelset is fine-tuned for wherever your ride takes you. Combining SR2D, 36T Ratchet System, CNC machined 6061 alloy hubs with J-Bend Pillar PDB1415 spokes, it delivers an exceptional balance of strength and durability on every mile. It also uses Star Ratchet hubs to ensure superior reliability due to each of the ratchets engaging simultaneously every time.
Easy Maintenance and Tubeless Ready
Featuring an incorporated notch, the newly developed shape of the end caps simplifies disassembly significantly and therefore makes maintenance even easier. You’ll also benefit from tool-free freehub conversion for straightforward upgrades and preservation in the future.
Coming complete with tubeless ready technology, the Prime Doyenne 50 Carbon Rim Brake Wheelset allows you to enjoy tubeless advantages such as the ability to run lower tyre pressures for increased traction, comfort and fewer chances of flats or punctures. This makes it a perfect upgrade for giving your road, time trial or triathlon ride a performance boost.
In The Box:
Tubeless Valves
QR Skewers
10 speed spacer
Prime Carbon Brake Pads

Ideal for flat road racing/riding as well as time trial (TT) and triathlon (Tri) disciplines, the Prime Doyenne 56 Carbon Disc Wheelset is feature-packed with technologies to upgrade the performance of your ride.
Whether you’re clocking up the miles with your local road club or competing in a TT or Tri event, this versatile wheelset is developed for reliable performance. It features two high-quality T700 unidirectional (UD) carbon fibre rims, which allow it to deliver the best balance of stiffness and durability, while also keeping weight impressively low. Prime has also kitted out this version with a 56mm rim depth that offers smooth rolling properties with increased aerodynamics as you cut through the wind.
Developed with Team Spectra
Developed with Team Spectra, the Prime Doyenne 56 Carbon Disc Wheelset has been put through the brand’s CFD testing process, where multiple sizes and shapes are trialled before coming up with the perfect blend of strength, weight and aerodynamics. As a result, you’ll benefit from Prime’s final product that you can trust and rely on thanks to its road testing by professional riders.
Combining SR2D, 36T Ratchet System, CNC machined 6061 alloy hubs with J-Bend Pillar PDB1415 spokes, this race-ready wheelset is all set for wherever your next ride takes you. It also uses Star Ratchet hubs to ensure superior reliability due to each of the ratchets engaging simultaneously every time.
Easy Maintenance and Tubeless Ready
Featuring an incorporated notch, the newly developed shape of the end caps simplifies disassembly significantly and therefore makes maintenance even easier. You’ll also benefit from tool-free freehub conversion for straightforward upgrades and preservation in the future.
Coming complete with tubeless ready technology, the Prime Doyenne 56 Carbon Disc Wheelset allows you to enjoy tubeless advantages such as the ability to run lower tyre pressures for increased traction, comfort and fewer chances of flats or punctures. This makes it a perfect upgrade for giving your ride a performance boost.

Prime Lifetime Crash Replacement Programme
At Prime we understand that a crash or unexpected accident may occur under normal riding conditions. If in the event of a fall or accident where your Prime product sustains damage beyond repair, you can return the damaged component in exchange for a new product at 40% off the RRP.

Built to send you on climbs, sprints and descents with unrivalled speed and stability, the carbon fibre Fulcrum Wind 40 road bike wheels give a rigid and responsive performance as you hit high speeds. Giving optimum crosswind stability from the 40mm rim depth and a superb surface contact area from their 27mm width, an assured and balanced feel is achieved on every ride.
Strong and Efficient Carbon-Fibre Road Wheels
Supported by a set of robust and reliable aluminium hubs, the Fulcrum Wind 40 Disc Wheelset benefits from a double butted stainless-steel spoke setup. The hubs also come with sealed cartridge bearings for minimised friction on the most challenging runs. With Two-Way Fit tubeless-ready compatibility improving cornering grip and puncture protection and disc brake optimisation for superior stopping power, this Wind 40 wheelset is a deep-rimmed and dynamic choice for hitting the road.

item_title: Prime Doyenne 38 Carbon Rim Brake Wheelset
item_description:
Classed as a perfect all-rounder, the Prime Doyenne 38 Carbon Rim Brake Wheelset boasts a carbon fibre rim construction with tubeless ready technology and rim brake compatibility. As a result, it offers superb aerodynamics as well as incredible strength.
Engineered for the demands of modern road racing and riding, this versatile wheelset features a high-quality T700 unidirectional (UD) carbon fibre rim build. Its stiff and lightweight construction combined with 38mm rim depth, means that you’ll benefit from a superior strength to weight ratio as well as increased aerodynamics as you cut through the wind.
Developed with Team Spectra and Star Ratchet Hubs
Developed with Team Spectra, this wheelset comes equipped with a range of performance-enhancing technologies to help you perform at your best and upgrade your ride. Prime has used an SR2, 36T Ratchet System, CNC machined 6061 alloy hub body, so you can enjoy greater reliability due to each of the ratchets engaging simultaneously every time. Its incorporated notch also means that the newly developed shape of the end caps simplifies disassembly significantly and therefore makes maintenance even easier. Due to this easy to use system, tool-free freehub conversion is possible should you choose to make changes to your setup in the future.
Rim Brake Compatible and Tubeless Ready
This road bike wheelset features rim brake compatibility, which keeps its weight reduced while also boosting its aerodynamic profile. Prime has also given it a tubeless ready design, so you can run tubeless tyres and enjoy performance advantages such as lower rolling resistance, increased traction and fewer risks of punctures. Coming complete with J-Bend Pillar PDB1415 spokes, the Prime Doyenne 38 Carbon Rim Brake Wheelset is an ideal choice of upgrade for conquering every mile of road.

Featuring a stiff and lightweight T800 UD carbon fibre rim construction, this model provides an excellent strength-to-weight ratio to give you maximum smoothness without adding any unnecessary excess grams to your ride. Prime has also put this version through its CFD testing process, where multiple sizes and shapes were used before coming up with the perfect blend of strength, weight and aerodynamics.
Greater Strength To Weight Ratio

Prime has also ensured that tool free freehub conversion is possible.

Developed to give modern riders and racers a much-needed performance upgrade, this wheelset comes kitted out with tubeless ready technology. This means that you can choose to run it tubeless and enjoy advantages such as the ability to run lower tyre pressures for increased stability, comfort and fewer chances of flats or punctures.

item_title: Prime Primavera 85 Carbon Rim Brake Rr Wheel
item_description:
Wider = Improved Performance
Developed with Team Spectra, this race-ready rear wheel features an 85mm deep aero rim profile, meaning you get more speed for the same effort. A wider rim profile creates a more linear contour with the tyre to increase the Primavera 85’s aerodynamic properties.
Greater Strength To Weight Ratio
Built up using a SR1, 36T Ratchet System, CNC machined 6061 alloy hub and DT Swiss straight pull spokes, this model creates a stiffer wheel with a greater strength to weight ratio and more reactivity. Its Star Ratchet hub also provides superior reliability, due to each of the ratchets engaging simultaneously every time. Prime has also ensured that tool free freehub conversion is possible. Coming kitted out with an incorporated notch, the newly developed shape of the end caps simplifies disassembly significantly and therefore makes maintenance even easier.
Aero Advantage
If you’re looking for an advantage in your next TT or Triathlon event, the Prime Primavera 85 Carbon rear wheel is a perfect choice of upgrade to improve your ride.
Lightweight Rim
Prime has experimented with numerous types of resin and tested countless new lay ups before they settled on the new and improved Primavera 85 rim. But that’s not all, they’ve upgraded to a higher grade of carbon, saving precious grams, and improving on the impact strength/weight ratio making the new Primavera 85 their best rim yet.

item_title: Prime Primavera 38 Carbon Rim Brake Wheelset
item_description:
Lightweight Rim
Prime has experimented with numerous types of resin and tested countless new lay ups before it settled on its new and improved Primavera 38 rim. But, that’s not all, the brand has upgraded to a higher grade of carbon, saving 40g per rim, and improving on the impact strength/weight ratio making the new Primavera 38 their best rim yet.
Wider = Improved Performance
The Prime Primavera 38 Carbon Wheelset features a 38mm deep aero rim profile to deliver benefits across multiple yaw angles. A wider rim profile creates a more linear contour with the tyre to increase the Primavera 38’s aerodynamic properties.
Greater Strength To Weight Ratio
Built up using the R010 CNC machined 7075 hubset and DT Swiss straight pull spokes the Prime Primavera 38 Carbon Wheelset creates a stiffer wheel with a greater strength to weight ratio and more reactivity.
Shave The Seconds
If you’re looking for an upgrade to shave the seconds away, the Prime Primavera 38 Carbon Wheelset is the wheelset you need to tame any terrain.

Prime Lifetime Crash Replacement Programme
At Prime we understand that a crash or unexpected accident may occur under normal riding conditions. If in the event of a fall or accident where your Prime product sustains damage beyond repair, you can return the damaged component in exchange for a new product at 40% off the RRP.

Guaranteeing performance and reliability at a budget-friendly price, this road bike wheelset is fine-tuned for smooth performance wherever your ride takes you. Thanks to its hard-wearing aluminium rims, it provides excellent strength and durability as you clock up the miles. Fulcrum has also equipped this model with 24 stainless steel, straight-pull spokes and brass nipples for increased rigidity as you put the power down. Coming complete with sealed cartridge bearings, disc brake compatibility and a range of ride-enhancing technologies, this is a great choice for dependable performance at an affordable price.
The great versatility of these wheels, whether training or on road rides with a gravel bike, is ensured by the updated low profile 24mm aluminium rims and an inner rim channel of 20mm, with the 2 Way Fit system.
The technical specifications of the Racing 6 DB ensure that they excel in different situations, climbing as well as windy conditions, and they can also fit wider tyres, clincher or tubeless (tubeless tape installed and valves included).
2-Way Fit Technology
2-Way Fit profile for tubeless and clincher. Tubeless technology was first used by the auto industry, then by motorcycles and now has reached the cycling industry. After its debut with mountain bikes the moment has come to “put it on the road”, and that’s what Fulcrum propose to do. The brand has developed its 2-Way Fit technology to ensure the perfect compatibility of its tubeless rims with normal clincher types and tubes. 2-Way Fit road bike wheels are perfectly multipurpose for tackling every situation. Thanks to a special impression in the valve area, the tubes are fitted with maximum precision while keeping the tube perfectly stable inside the tyre. Housing the valve for tubeless tyres is also risk-free, with the unquestionable advantage that there are never any air infiltrations caused by non-ideal positioning when fitting.
AFS Axle System
The Axial Fixing System is the solution developed by Fulcrum to fix the disc brake to the hub. The constraint granted by the butt area of the release mechanism, greater than in familiar standard ones, makes it possible to obtain greater structural rigidity and therefore more precise and powerful braking.
F.I.C 100% Handmade Quality
Fulcrum Identification Card (F.I.C) 100%handemade quality. Right from its inception, Fulcrum has been marked by a feature that continues to this day: that is to design, prototype and industrialise all the wheels characterised by the red “F”. Indeed these take shape inside of the R&D, the leading-edge department that represents the beating heart of the Italian company. Every single component of the wheel, the materials chosen and the technologies applied are the tangible result of the effort that Fulcrum makes every day to give you maximum performance and reliability.
Additional Item Top Features:

Rim Height Category: Low

Inner Rim Width (Channel): 20mm

item_title: Prime Primavera 50 Carbon Rim Brake Wheelset
item_description:
Lightweight Rim
Prime has experimented with numerous types of resin and tested countless new lay ups before it settled on its new and improved Primavera 50 rim. But, that’s not all, the brand has upgraded to a higher grade of carbon, saving precious grams, and improving on the impact strength/weight ratio making the new Primavera 50 their best rim yet.
Wider = Improved Performance
The Prime Primavera 50 Carbon Wheelset features a 50mm deep aero rim profile to provide strong aerodynamic properties by reducing the amount of turbulence when the air meets the spokes. The Primavera 50 combines this with a wider rim profile to create a more linear contour between the tyre and rim interface, reducing rolling resistance and creating a greater contact patch for greater stability in corners.
Greater Strength To Weight Ratio
Built-up using an SR1, CNC machined 6061 alloy hub body and DT Swiss spokes, the Prime Primavera 50 Carbon Wheelset creates a stiffer wheel with a greater strength to weight ratio and more reactivity. Featuring an incorporated notch, the newly developed shape of the end caps simplifies disassembly significantly and therefore makes maintenance even easier. Its Star Ratchet hub also provides superior reliability, due to each of the ratchets engaging simultaneously every time. Prime has also ensured that tool free freehub conversion is possible.
Crush The Competition
If you’re wanting to beat all your personal bests, the Prime Primavera 50 Carbon Wheelset has everything you need to conquer the climb or wreck the competition on the flats.

Constructed to carry you through training rides and rapid races with power and pace, the excellent Fulcrum Wind 40c pushes its 40mm deep carbon rims to the limit to keep you rolling steadily and quickly for every rampant run.
Fast-Rolling Carbon Fibre Road Wheels
Featuring a special AC3 treated, 3K carbon braking surface, both rims on the Fulcrum Wind 40c Clincher Road Wheelset ensure a powerful stopping performance, giving consummate control as you ride at thrillingly high speeds. Spinning on a pair of aluminium hubs, the wheels also benefit from smooth spinning sealed cartridge bearings and strong straightpull spokes for a stiff and strong structure, however hard you ride.

This carbon disc rear wheel is stiff, strong and lightweight. It’s engineered to provide exceptional aerodynamic efficiency and gives you faster straight-line speeds and greater stability in all riding conditions. Plus, this wheel is tubeless-ready, which significantly reduces the risk of punctures, but that’s not all, the rolling resistance is lower and thanks to being able to use lower pressures, cornering grip is much better.

Ready for long days on the road, this wheelset is equipped with a hard-wearing aluminium rim construction, which offers an excellent combination of strength, durability and performance as you clock up the miles. Fulcrum has also kitted out this model with an asymmetric rim design that’s engineered to improve rim tension, balancing the forces from your disc brakes and sprocket cassette. Another highlight is its 24 rounded straight-pull stainless steel spokes, which ensure smooth and stable rolling performance as you go the extra distance. Coming complete with sealed cartridge bearings and many of the brand’s finest technologies including 2-Way Fit, this is a great choice of upgrade for low rolling resistance, increased grip and greater protection thanks to its tubeless compatible design.
Endurance Road Bike Wheelset
The Racing 5 DB wheels are the perfect choice for endurance bikes. The lower aerodynamic resistance and decreased stiffness, achieved with the lower 24mm U-shaped profile, makes them the ideal technical choice for long rides without having to worry about climbing, rain or wind, with a consequent saving in energy and increased comfort.
2 Way Fit Ready Technology
In this case to the aluminium rim has seen an increase in the inner channel width, up to 20mm from the previous model’s 17mm, and the addition of the innovative 2 Way Fit system, to comfortably fit 25-28 mm tyres, both clinchers and tubeless (tubeless tape installed and valves included).
Laser-Etched Graphics
The aesthetics have undergone the same intervention as the Racing 4 DB model, with the updated laser-etched graphics, ensuring the long life of their striking design.
Additional Item Top Features:
Tyre Size: 700c
Tyre Type: 2-Way Fit Ready (Clincher/Tubeless Ready)
Brake Compatibility: Disc brake, AFS
Spokes Material: Stainless Steel
Spokes Profile Technology: Rounded, straight pull
Front Wheel Spokes: 24 (Left: 16; Right: 8)
Rear Wheel Spokes: 24 (Left: 8; Right: 16)
Nipples Material: Aluminium
Hubs: Aluminium, Aluminium flanges
Bearings: Sealed cartridge bearings, adjustable
Freehub Compatibility: Multiple options available to select
Finish: Lasered + Stickers
Max System Weight Limit: 120kg
Technologies:
Anti-Rotation System: This new system raises the concept of spoking to a new level of performance for road bike and triathlon wheels ( and MTB too). The Fulcrum engineers have redesigned the spokes and the hub housings to create a solid and unmoveable whole. The result is that the spokes will never lose their initial tension, thus keeping the wheel perfectly reactive and centred. The spokes will remain in the position that has been studied in the wind tunnel tests to ensure the best aerodynamic penetration possible.
Fulcrum Identification Card (F.I.C.) 100% Handmade Quality: Right from its inception Fulcrum has been marked by a feature that continues to this day: that is to design, prototype and industrialise all the wheels characterised by the red “F”.
Indeed these take shape inside of the R&D, the leading-edge department that represents the beating heart of the Italian company. Every single component of the wheel, the materials chosen and the technologies applied are the tangible result of the effort that Fulcrum makes every day to give you maximum performance and reliability.
AFS Axle System: The Axial Fixing System is the solution developed by Fulcrum to fix the disc brake to the hub. The constraint granted by the butt area of the release mechanism, greater than in familiar standard ones, makes it possible to obtain greater structural rigidity and therefore more precise and powerful braking.
Asymmetric Rim: The asymmetry is designed to improve rim tension, balancing the forces from brakes and sprocket cassette.
2-Way Fit Ready: This procedure transforms Racing 5 DB wheels (designed to be used with a clincher tyre and inner tube) into tubeless ready wheels (i.e. with a Tubeless Easy tyre, no inner tube and compulsory use of a sealant liquid). Use of tubeless and tubeless ready tyres is forbidden on 2-way Fit Ready rims without official Fulcrum 2-way Fit Ready adhesive tape. This model comes with tubeless type installed and valves included.

item_description:
Ideally suited for hilly races, gravel and fast training rides, this wheelset comes equipped with two 6069 aluminium rims for the best balance of strength and durability on mixed terrains. Prime has also kitted out this updated model with a 21mm internal rim width and a 25mm rim depth for more balanced and consistent rolling performance. Another highlight is it’s tubeless ready, so you can enjoy tubeless advantages such as lower rolling resistance, improved traction and fewer chances of punctures.
Aerodynamic, Stiff and Reactive
With the use of DT Swiss straight pull spokes, not only is aerodynamics improved, the Prime Attaquer Disc Alloy Wheelset is also stiffer and more reactive, so if you’re in the market for a high-end alloy wheelset, look no further.
Star Ratchet Hubs
Another standout feature of this alloy road wheelset is its Star Rachet hubs. These provide superior reliability, due to each of the ratchets engaging simultaneously every time. Featuring an incorporated notch, the newly developed shape of the end caps simplifies disassembly significantly and therefore makes maintenance even easier. Tool-free freehub conversion is also possible.
Optimal Braking Performance
Disc brakes generate an incredible amount of stopping power, even in wet conditions, so you can fly up the hills and descend with confidence knowing that when you pair your favourite brakes to this set, you’re going to get the control you need to succeed. This model is Centre Lock disc brake mount compatible.

The completely redesigned rim for the Campagnolo Zonda C17 road wheels takes its design inspiration from the growing trend that sees the use of increasingly wider tyres, with 25mm clinchers becoming the standard if not the new minimum sizing for road riding and racing. With this increased popularity of both 25mm and 28mm tyres, the wheel needs to be designed in a way to optimise the tyre/wheel interface.
The updated wider rim on the Campagnolo Zonda C17 wheelset ensures a more efficient shape of the tyre, improving cornering grip and safety while reducing aerodynamic drag and rolling resistance. This seemingly small increase in width offers a surprisingly different riding experience, one that is sure to leave any cyclist pleasantly convinced that this change is for the best. The C17 rim has also been structurally optimised and ensures a surefooted grip on clincher tyres, as well as even better braking, feel when compared with previous versions.

The Campagnolo Bora WTO 45 features advanced carbon rims for unrivalled stiffness, lightness and handling ability when hitting top speeds on your road bike. Designed to provide maximum aerodynamic qualities, at particular angles, they harness the power of the wind to propel you to road-riding excellence.
Carbon Fibre Fast-Rolling Road Wheelset
The front wheel is equipped with 18 steel spokes and the rear has 21, with differing patterns allowing them to efficiently slice through the air. Measuring a 19mm internal rim width, 23mm, 25mm and 28mm tyres can be fitted to the Two-Way Fit Campagnolo Bora WTO 45 wheelset, which is compatible with tubeless and clincher tyres for ultimate versatility. An AC3 (All Conditions Carbon Control) treatment aids outstanding rim braking performance in all conditions, rounding out this superb set of aerodynamic racing wheels.
Included:

Special brake block kit for carbon wheels (red compound): 40% better braking performance in wet conditions and 20% better in dry.
Lightweight Quick Release wheels with an aerodynamic profile and shiny finish.
Tubeless valves with valve extenders
Bushing to reduce the size of the valve hole
2 levers in composite material for tyre removal
User manual

2:1 Two-To-One
Every push on the pedals from the rider will force most of that energy on the drive side of the rear wheel. To combat this loss of rim tension and power transfer, Fulcrum has solved this cycling problem with their 2:1 spoke ratio pattern by doubling the spoke count in crucial zones on the wheel.
Anti-Rotation System
This system locks the spoke in place once the correct tension is achieved. Engineers at Fulcrum have designed this system to ensure the spokes never lose their initial tension and to remain in the position that has been proven to provide the perfect aerodynamic properties.
Rim Dynamic Balance
Simple and Elegant, the weight of the rim gasket is balanced on the opposite side with an item of similar weight.

item_title: Campagnolo Shamal Ultra C17 2-Way Fit Wheelset
item_description: Born as the very first complete wheelset with each component in its build being specifically designed as a complete unit to ensure unparalleled efficiency and performance the Shamal continued to introduce new technologies that would change the way aluminum performance wheels were produced. So advanced was the Shamal in its early stages that it was found also in World Tour competition often and to this day is still perhaps the most race ready aluminum wheelset available.

The Campagnolo Bora Ultra 35 Wheelset features CULT Ceramic bearings, which provide extreme smoothness, the lowest friction coefficient thanks to oil lubrication and are 9 times more efficient than standard bearings and will spin for up to 47 minutes after being run at 500rpms.
Campagnolo engineering staff have developed a new construction that provides a braking performance superior to other carbon rims. The AC3 (All Condition Carbon Control) technology not only improves braking in the dry but boosts performance by 43% over past Campagnolo models and nearly 55% over that of its closest rivals when the roads get wet. Apart from the obvious textured braking surface the construction of the new Bora wheels also underwent internal improvement to ensure maximum integrity when faced with the increased force and heat deriving from the new braking surface.
One of the biggest changes and improvements to the Bora Ultra 35 Wheelset is the increased rim width, moving from 20.5 to 24.2 mm. This allows the Bora Ultra 35 Wheelset to improve its aerodynamic properties and house wider tyres, thus increasing the control and creating a more comfortable ride. The wider rim also contributes to an increase in structural strength, thus increasing the already lauded resistance and reliability of the Bora family.
The wider rim also contributes to an increase in structural strength, thus increasing the already lauded resistance and reliability of the Bora family. The benefits continue, as the wider rim creates a stronger structure with less need for material intended for structural reinforcement decreasing the overall weight of the wheel.
If you, like pros, want the very best on the market then look no further than the Campagnolo Bora Ultra 35 Wheelset.
In The Box

Carbon Brake Pad set (40% better braking performance in wet conditions and 20% in the dry)
New, re-designed quick-release skewers
Valve Extender
User Manual
Warranty Booklet
Campagnolo Wheel Identification Card

The Campagnolo Bora WTO 60 has been tested rigorously to allow for a new rim design that maximises aerodynamic penetration for those particularly sharp wind angles and downwind presses. With a hub that promotes airflow detachment and a spoke set-up (18-elliptical cross at front, 21-rear cross at rear) engineered to overcome rolling resistance, this is the perfect wheelset for those expecting to face tough conditions.
Aerodynamic Road Wheels with Advanced Stopping Power
With the implementation of AC3™ technology in the rim brake design of the Campagnolo Bora WTO 60 Wheelset, with years of research put into the durability and stopping power of the texture, you can be sure of a more reliable stop with this wheelset whether it’s wet or dry.
Included:

Special brake block kit for carbon wheels (red compound): 40% better braking performance in wet conditions and 20% better in dry
Lightweight Quick Release wheels with an aerodynamic profile and shiny finish

The Campagnolo Bora Ultra 50 Wheelset features CULT Ceramic bearings, which provide extreme smoothness, the lowest friction coefficient thanks to oil lubrication and are 9 times more efficient than standard bearings and will spin for up to 47 minutes after being run at 500rpms.
Campagnolo engineering staff have developed a new construction that provides a braking performance superior to other carbon rims. The AC3 (All Condition Carbon Control) technology not only improves braking in the dry but boosts performance by 43% over past Campagnolo models and nearly 55% over that of its closest rivals when the roads get wet. Apart from the obvious textured braking surface the construction of the new Bora wheels also underwent internal improvement to ensure maximum integrity when faced with the increased force and heat deriving from the new braking surface.
![AC 3 Braking Surface](//s.wiggle.co.uk/images/Bora AC3 SMALL.jpg)
One of the biggest changes and improvements to the Bora Ultra 50 Wheelset is the increased rim width, moving from 20.5 to 24.2 mm. This allows the Bora Ultra 50 Wheelset to improve its aerodynamic properties and house wider tyres, thus increasing the control and creating a more comfortable ride. The wider rim also contributes to an increase in structural strength, thus increasing the already lauded resistance and reliability of the Bora family.
The wider rim also contributes to an increase in structural strength, thus increasing the already lauded resistance and reliability of the Bora family. The benefits continue, as the wider rim creates a stronger structure with less need for material intended for structural reinforcement decreasing the overall weight of the wheel.
If you’re looking for the complete pro package but don’t have the support car to ride tubular, the Campagnolo Bora Ultra 50 Clincher Wheelset has all the benefits you need to perform at your best.

A top choice for the podium-chasing time trial (TT) or triathlon racer, the Campagnolo Bora WTO 45 road bike wheels deliver excellent aerodynamic penetration from the streamlined design of their rims and hubs. Constructed from a responsive and rigid carbon layup, the 19mm width and vertically compliant 45mm depth ensure precise handling and efficient power transfer as you push yourself to your limits.
Carbon Fibre Aerodynamic Road Wheels
Equipped with Black Aluminium Monolithic hubs with USB ceramic cup and cone bearings, every rotation of the Campagnolo bora Bora WTO 45 DB wheels is super-smooth, giving you a consistent experience on every ride. Stunningly supportive to deal with the pressures and impacts of high-speed racing, the rear hub also comes with the choice of a Shimano, SRAM or Campagnolo freehub to suit your preferred drivetrain. Optimised for use with disc brakes to give unrivalled stopping power and control, this 2-Way Fit tubeless-ready wheelset sends you to silverware with speed and strength.

35 mm tubeless valve
35 mm valve extender

This Campagnolo Bora WTO 33 wheelset features two carbon fibre rims, which means that you’ll enjoy its incredible stiffness, without adding any excess weight to your ride. Designed for extreme performance, this wheelset also keeps you safe, thanks to its G3 spoking system. This ensures that you’ll always stay balanced when braking in all racing conditions.
Each component of these Campagnolo Bora WTO 33 Carbon Wheels has been optimised in the wind tunnel in order to improve their aerodynamic performance. This has resulted in multiple benefits that can be noted on different routes, from the most demanding of sprints to relaunching after a bend, while still ensuring efficiency on the flat and now also suitable for the hardest uphill finishes. It is a turning point in the all-rounder segment: a truly multi-purpose wheel.
With the carbon rims’ unidirectional aerodynamic finish, and the aluminium hubs with their ceramic USB cup-and-cone bearing system: every design choice has been made with a view to optimising performance. The 19mm internal diameter of the rim enables tyres of 23mm, 25mm and 28mm to be fitted. In addition, with this 2-Way Fit version, Campagnolo offers its tried-and-tested technology with full compatibility with clincher and tubeless tyres. While the key purpose of these wheels is to deliver extreme performance, safety is also guaranteed by the Campagnolo AC3 (All Conditions Carbon Control) technology, which ensures safe, modular braking in all weather conditions.
